ValidationRule.description: If this is a virtual record, we need to require either a SFDC account/opportunity, or a Siebel opportunity #, or contract #.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $RecordType.Name = "Virtual", ISBLANK(Account__c), ISBLANK(Opportunity__c), ISBLANK(Contract_Number__c), ISBLANK(Opportunity_Number__c), ISBLANK(Opportunity_Number__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please link this record to an existing Account or Opportunity in Salesforce, or enter an Account #, Contract #, or Siebel Opportunity #.
